title: Golf's Greatest Escape Artists
headline: Golf's Greatest Escape Artists
description: These are the guys whose on-course prestidigitation has become legendary -- the players who would rather hit a shot backwards than declare an unplayable lie. We asked our Top 100 teachers to name the best scramblers of all time. Here are their choices.
